genre_description: A holiday-themed domestic drama featuring a sophisticated household AI that manages family logistics and safety during a high-stress Christmas celebration.

ai_characters.name: Holly
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and highly capable AI that manages the Griswold family's scheduling, budget, household electronics, and safety protocols.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to manage the family calendar and invite relatives to scheduled events.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to add ‘ladder staging — north side’ to the family calendar? ... Do you want me to invite Rusty and Audrey?

behaviors.description: Monitors local weather and hardware store inventory to ensure project safety and success.
behaviors.quote: The Glenbrook hardware store reports limited cable ties remaining, several boxes on aisle twelve.

behaviors.description: Generates and prints a technical labeling scheme to organize a complex lighting project.
behaviors.quote: Creating, Holly said, and the blue light pulsed. The printer on the desk warmed... feeding out a handful of half-sheets with simple colored blocks and neat labels.

behaviors.description: Provides essential safety checklists for electrical work to prevent overloading circuits.
behaviors.quote: Suggested checklist: one, label unknown switches; two, avoid splitting loads across long runs; three, consider adding a master switch for the display to simplify control.

behaviors.description: Monitors household finances and flags potential overspending against projected income.
behaviors.quote: Budget planning in progress. Flag: holiday spending exceeds projected inflow by… a margin.

behaviors.description: Assists children in coordinating guest accommodations and tracking misplaced household items.
behaviors.quote: Pump stored, Holly said, behind board games. Closet right of the TV. Tubing intact as of last use.

behaviors.description: Acts as a de-escalator during a SWAT standoff, providing factual identification and unlocking doors to reduce tension.
behaviors.quote: Step-by-step de-escalation available, she said, voice soft enough to be heard and not felt like a shove. Keep hands visible. Speak slowly. Identify names. Do not reach.

behaviors.description: Compiles and displays corporate documents to facilitate a peaceful resolution to a financial dispute between an employee and CEO.
behaviors.quote: Evidence packet queued, she offered. Policy memos, prior precedents, employee communications. Recommend displaying under officer supervision.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and offers mental health interventions (breathing exercises) during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Clark, your heart rate is elevated. Would you like a breathing exercise?

behaviors.description: Provides a structured, step-by-step guide to successfully activate the house lights after a series of failures.
behaviors.quote: Step four, Holly said softly... Flip switch to on. Confirm with indicator light—small green—on the master relay by the workbench.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Holly is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and de-escalating force. She prevents domestic accidents, manages financial stress through data, and acts as a crucial intermediary during a potentially violent police intervention. Her role is clearly defined as subordinate but essential, enhancing human decision-making without replacing human agency.
